TestDescription.name: Ektron CMS400.NET ContentRatingGraph.aspx SQL injection
TestDescription.Description: Ektron CMS400.NET is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the ContentRatingGraph.aspx script using the res parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can view, add, modify or delete information from the back-end database
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version Ektron CMS.
